title: Countries with highest ransomware infection rates 2017 to 2018
yAxis: Share of users attacked with ransomware out of all users encountering malware
summary: This bar chart has 10 columns on the x axis representing Country, and Share of users attacked with ransomware out of all users encountering malware in each Country on the y axis.
The Share of users attacked with ransomware out of all users encountering malware is appeared to be the highest at Country Thailand and lowest at Country Turkey.
There is a difference of 6.35 between the maximum Country Thailand and minimum Country Turkey.
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing Country in the x axis and Share of users attacked with ransomware out of all users encountering malware in the y axis.
The maximum Share of users attacked with ransomware out of all users encountering malware 9.57 is found at Country Thailand and the minimum is found at Turkey where Country is 3.22.
mid_summary: This bar chart has 10 columns on the x axis representing Country, and Share of users attacked with ransomware out of all users encountering malware in each Country on the y axis.
The Share of users attacked with ransomware out of all users encountering malware is appeared to be the highest at Country Thailand and lowest at Country Turkey.
There is a difference of 6.35 between the maximum Country Thailand and minimum Country Turkey.
max_summary: This bar chart has 10 columns on the x axis representing Country, and Share of users attacked with ransomware out of all users encountering malware in each Country on the y axis.

Country Thailand has the highest Share of users attacked with ransomware out of all users encountering malware and Turkey has the lowest Share of users attacked with ransomware out of all users encountering malware.
Country United Arab Emirates has the second highest value for Share of users attacked with ransomware out of all users encountering malware.
Country Turkey has 2.97 times less Share of users attacked with ransomware out of all users encountering malware than Country Thailand which is the highest.
Country Thailand is higher than any other Countrys with value 9.57, followed by United Arab Emirates, and Iran. Down to Country Turkey with the lowest value 3.22.
The Country Turkey has 1.53 times less Share of users attacked with ransomware out of all users encountering malware than average.
The Share of users attacked with ransomware out of all users encountering malware is 62.4 if we add up values of all Countrys.
